Issue.creator: manojgop
Issue.summary: Seth RPC contact deploy transaction unsuccessful
Issue.description: Generate the blob of hex-encoded bytes docker exec -it seth-rpc bash. execute below command in seth-rpc container seth-rpc --connect tcp://validator:4004 --bind 0.0.0.0:3030 --unlock myalias execute below command from your linux terminal curl -d '{"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "eth_sendTransaction", "id": 2, "params": {"from": "0x {address} ", "data": "0x\{contract}"} }' -H "Content-Type: application/json" localhost:3030 and in the result I get a transaction ID in result as {"jsonrpc":"2.0","result":"0xcd90ed04b886f0e862c978a82893e8000aa59fe20430589dfdb76a26fc11c74f65d16b5376a7118572b4d10f52cf7ee0d82132b800a63a417715ff7f6b786a78","id":2} But when I call “eth_getTransactionReceipt” with above getting null result curl -d '{"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "eth_getTransactionReceipt", "id": 3, "params": "0xcd90ed04b886f0e862c978a82893e8000aa59fe20430589dfdb76a26fc11c74f65d16b5376a7118572b4d10f52cf7ee0d82132b800a63a417715ff7f6b786a78" }' -H "Content-Type: application/json" localhost:3030 {"jsonrpc":"2.0","result":null,"id":3} The above transaction to deploy the contract is also not submitted in blockchain since http://localhost:8080/transactions/cd90ed04b886f0e862c978a82893e8000aa59fe20430589dfdb76a26fc11c74f65d16b5376a7118572b4d10f52cf7ee0d82132b800a63a417715ff7f6b786a78|http://localhost:8080/transactions/ ? gives error message : "There is no transaction with the id specified in the blockchain.", There are no messages in seth-rpc container when contract gets deployed >
